TopicTitle: Going To Be Starting A YT Channel, Advice?

Articles.Content:
I plan to start a Youtube channel for my KSP on the 30th, and I would like some advice. Like, how much should I post weekly, live vs. post, etc. Also, if anyone knows any good FREE screen capture software, that would be great. Thanks!

PS.Mods, if this isn't the right section, feel free to move it.

I have a youtube channel and one of the things I figured is you need to be consistant with uploading videos, I try to help out as many people as I can on my Channel for the sake of building a good reputation with them , The programs I use

Recording: Quicktime

Editing: IMovie & Final Cut Pro X

( I am on a mac too )
I just upload because I like to. My gaming channel is now composed of ~98% KSP.
I upload on weekends. Why? I have the most time on weekends.
